description: Plans could be a little bit cheaper.

The free version that the user ends up with, after using the trial version for 15 days, is heavily downgraded. Personally, I am surprised that the company is trying to bet the usage of this product based on those who are willing to pay a very hefty amount on a browser alone. Besides the monetization part, a great browser indeed. Grouping of "apps" is something that other chromium based browser can ape without charging customers, so the monetization strategy is definitely questionable.
summary: Good idea, but they need to have a free version
